00059 // ===========================================================================
00060 // FOX callback mapping
00061 // ===========================================================================
00062 FXDEFMAP(GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor) GUIDialog_GLChosenEditorMap[] = {
00063     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_LOAD,       GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdLoad),
00064     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_SAVE,       GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdSave),
00065     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_DESELECT,   GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdDeselect),
00066     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CHOOSEN_CLEAR,      GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdClear),
00067     FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND,  MID_CANCEL,             GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdClose),
00068 };
00069 
00070 FXIMPLEMENT(GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor, FXMainWindow, GUIDialog_GLChosenEditorMap, ARRAYNUMBER(GUIDialog_GLChosenEditorMap))

00072 
00073 // ===========================================================================
00074 // method definitions
00075 // ===========================================================================
00076 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor(GUIMainWindow* parent,
00077         GUISelectedStorage* str)
00078     : FXMainWindow(parent->getApp(), "List of Selected Items", NULL, NULL, DECOR_ALL, 20, 20, 300, 300),
00079       myParent(parent), myStorage(str) {
00080     myStorage->add2Update(this);
00081     FXHorizontalFrame* hbox =
00082         new FXHorizontalFrame(this, LAYOUT_FILL_X | LAYOUT_FILL_Y, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00083                               0, 0, 0, 0);
00084     // build the list
00085     myList = new FXList(hbox, 0, 0,
00086                         LAYOUT_FILL_X | LAYOUT_FILL_Y | LIST_MULTIPLESELECT);
00087     rebuildList();
00088     // build the layout
00089     FXVerticalFrame* layout = new FXVerticalFrame(hbox, LAYOUT_TOP, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00090             4, 4, 4, 4);
00091     // "Load"
00092     new FXButton(layout, "Load\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_LOAD,
00093                  ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED,
00094                  0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00095     // "Save"
00096     new FXButton(layout, "Save\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_SAVE,
00097                  ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED,
00098                  0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00099 
00100     new FXHorizontalSeparator(layout, SEPARATOR_GROOVE | LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00101 
00102     // "Deselect Chosen"
00103     new FXButton(layout, "Deselect Chosen\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_DESELECT,
00104                  ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED,
00105                  0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00106     // "Clear List"
00107     new FXButton(layout, "Clear\t\t", 0, this, MID_CHOOSEN_CLEAR,
00108                  ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED,
00109                  0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00110 
00111     new FXHorizontalSeparator(layout, SEPARATOR_GROOVE | LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00112 
00113     // "Close"
00114     new FXButton(layout, "Close\t\t", 0, this, MID_CANCEL,
00115                  ICON_BEFORE_TEXT | LAYOUT_FILL_X | FRAME_THICK | FRAME_RAISED,
00116                  0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 4, 3, 3);
00117     setIcon(GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_APP_SELECTOR));
00118     myParent->addChild(this);
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::~GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor() {
00123     myStorage->remove2Update();
00124     myParent->removeChild(this);
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 void
00129 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::rebuildList() {
00130     myList->clearItems();
00131     const std::set<GUIGlID> &chosen = gSelected.getSelected();
00132     for (std::set<GUIGlID>::const_iterator i = chosen.begin(); i != chosen.end(); ++i) {
00133         GUIGlObject* object = GUIGlObjectStorage::gIDStorage.getObjectBlocking(*i);
00134         if (object != 0) {
00135             std::string name = object->getFullName();
00136             FXListItem* item = myList->getItem(myList->appendItem(name.c_str()));
00137             item->setData(object);
00138             GUIGlObjectStorage::gIDStorage.unblockObject(*i);
00139         }
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00144 void
00145 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::selectionUpdated() {
00146     rebuildList();
00147     FXMainWindow::update();
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 long
00152 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdLoad(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00153     // get the new file name
00154     FXFileDialog opendialog(this, "Open List of Selected Items");
00155     opendialog.setIcon(GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_EMPTY));
00156     opendialog.setSelectMode(SELECTFILE_EXISTING);
00157     opendialog.setPatternList("*.txt");
00158     if (gCurrentFolder.length() != 0) {
00159         opendialog.setDirectory(gCurrentFolder);
00160     }
00161     if (opendialog.execute()) {
00162         gCurrentFolder = opendialog.getDirectory();
00163         std::string file = opendialog.getFilename().text();
00164         std::string msg = gSelected.load(file);
00165         if (msg != "") {
00166             FXMessageBox::error(this, MBOX_OK, "Errors while loading Selection", msg.c_str());
00167         }
00168         rebuildList();
00169     }
00170     return 1;
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 long
00175 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdSave(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00176     FXString file = MFXUtils::getFilename2Write(this, "Save List of selected Items", ".txt", GUIIconSubSys::getIcon(ICON_EMPTY), gCurrentFolder);
00177     if (file == "") {
00178         return 1;
00179     }
00180     try {
00181         gSelected.save(file.text());
00182     } catch (IOError& e) {
00183         FXMessageBox::error(this, MBOX_OK, "Storing failed!", e.what());
00184     }
00185     return 1;
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 long
00190 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdDeselect(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00191     FXint no = myList->getNumItems();
00192     FXint i;
00193     std::vector<GUIGlID> selected;
00194     for (i = 0; i < no; ++i) {
00195         if (myList->getItem(i)->isSelected()) {
00196             selected.push_back(static_cast<GUIGlObject*>(myList->getItem(i)->getData())->getGlID());
00197         }
00198     }
00199     // remove items from list
00200     for (i = 0; i < (FXint) selected.size(); ++i) {
00201         gSelected.deselect(selected[i]);
00202     }
00203     // rebuild list
00204     rebuildList();
00205     myParent->updateChildren();
00206     return 1;
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 
00211 long
00212 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdClear(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00213     myList->clearItems();
00214     gSelected.clear();
00215     myParent->updateChildren();
00216     return 1;
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 
00221 long
00222 GUIDialog_GLChosenEditor::onCmdClose(FXObject*, FXSelector, void*) {
00223     close(true);
00224     return 1;
00225 }
